articles.description: During the decade when McEnroe, Borg, Maradona, Tyson, Graf were conquering new peaks; Tendulkar, Sampras, Air Jordan were making heads turn, unknown to the world, a set of very special babies were born around the world. And now even they are on the way out a…
articles.content: Sports fans of a certain vintage wistfully remember the 80s as the best days of their lives. It was a decade of the GOATS – some were conquering new peaks, some were starting their journeys and some … [+5687 chars]

articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: ‘Buttler leading England, Cummins Australia but where is India’s captain Rohit?' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Chopra said all the other teams around the globe don't change their captains as much as India. He gave the examples of Sri Lanka's Dasun Shanaka, England's Jos Buttler and Australia's Pat Cummins and said Rohit Sharma should play more frequently. | Cricket
articles.content: Since taking over as India's all-format captain almost a year ago, Rohit Sharma has led India in only six ODIs - three against West Indies at home and three in England. In the same time period, Shikh… [+3286 chars]
